title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answers

2 points are earned for the interpretations of ∫ 0 3.5 v(t) dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4185@ and ∫ 0 3.5 | v(t) | dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@453B@

∫ 0 3.5 v(t) dt =2.844 (or 2.843) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4F04@

∫ 0 3.5 | v(t) | dt =3.737 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@49F9@

The integral ∫ 0 3.5 v(t) dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4219@ is the displacement of the particle over the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 3.5.

The integral ∫ 0 3.5 | v(t) | dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@43F9@ is the total distance traveled by the particle over the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 3.5.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned if sets v(t)= x 2 ′ (t) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42E9@

1 point is earned for the answer

v(t)= x 2 ′ (t) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42E9@

v(t) = 2t - 1 ⇒ t = 1.57054

The two particles are moving with the same velocity at time t = 1.571 (or 1570).
